name: Special edition Airwrap multi-styler and dryer Complete Long in Strawberry bronze and blush pink
about: What it is:A special edition Dyson Airwrap Complete Long for straight and wavy hair in strawberry bronze and blush pink with a complimentary Detangling comb..Hair Texture:Straight and Wavy.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Curl-Enhancing.Key Benefits:- Six versatile attachments engineered for different hair types, lengths, and styles.What Else You Need to Know:This special edition Dyson Airwrap Complete Long for straight and wavy hair in strawberry bronze and blush pink has a complimentary Detangling comb. The tool dries, curls, shapes, smooths, and hides flyaways with no heat damage. The re-engineered attachments harness Enhanced Coanda airflow for faster and more versatile styling.u00b9.Features:- Coanda styling pioneered by Dyson: The Dyson Airwrap multi-styler harnesses an aerodynamic phenomenon called the Coanda effect. It uses air to attract and wrap hair to the barrel or surface of the brush..Key Controls:- Airflow speed: Three precise airflow speeds to suit your styling preference..Includes:- Two-in-one Coanda smoothing dryer to dry, smooth, and hide flyaways.u00b3
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Styling Tips:.-For best results, start with freshly washed hair. .-Use the Coanda smoothing dryer to take hair from damp to about 80% dry..-Use the 1.2-inch barrel for a defined curl or the 1.6-inch barrel for a bouncy curl on longer hair..-Use the Firm or Soft smoothing brush to smooth and lengthen hair (if needed before curling)..-Use the Round volumizing brush to add body and shape to hair for a blowout look..-Finish with the Coanda smoothing dryer in Flyaway mode to finish your look and hide flyaways...Other Tips:.-Don't forget to use the cold shot to set your curls or style..-Curling: Use higher heat and airflow. Take small sections of hair and introduce the ends of your hair to the arrows on the barrel. Once hair begins to wrap, move the barrel towards your head without twisting allowing air to wrap damp hair around the barrel. Hold until hair is dry. Push the cold shot to set the curl.  .-Using high heat and high airflow, allow air to wrap damp hair tress around the barrel. When hair is dry, use a cold shot to set the style. Turn machine off before removing from hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are so many mixed reviews about the airwrap all over, but, I really really love mine. I did receive it as a birthday gift. I could not curl my hair at all before the airwrap; couldnu2019t get my hair to hold any styles, always left funny lines/crimps when curling with an iron, getting too hot and flustered cause I just couldnu2019t get my hair to do what I wanted, etc. The airwrap changed all of that for me and now I love doing my hair. For the first time in my life I can curl my hair haha! Even just blow drying, my hair feels much sleeker than a regular hairdryer. I have very long thick hair so I do need to use some products to achieve the best hold, but the machine itself is not heavy or awkward to hold and I find it to be a very versatile machine. I love the strawberry bronze/blush pink colour way as well as I personally did not love any of the previous colour ways. Hands down, this is a fabulous machine and I can achieve so many different styles with it!

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, my hair is so shine!ud83dude0dud83dude0d after used the Dyson!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decided to finally get the Airwrap during the Sephora sale. It does not disappoint, and my hair routine is much quicker with this as well. It takes a few tries to get used to it, but itu2019s comfortable to hold, and itu2019s not super loud. I love the curling iron, I use it on damp or dry hair (dry hair - high heat & low fan). It gives me big wavy whimsical curls that I canu2019t get with any other hair tools. The blow dryer is great, but I prefer the round brush to dry. I donu2019t understand the difference between the 2 smoothing brushes though, they do the same thing? They work great to smooth any wrinkles out from pony tails, etc. If you want sleek smooth straight hair, you canu2019t achieve that with this tool. If you want the best big bouncy u2018Pantene Pro-Vu2019 commercial hair, itu2019s a must buy!

reviews.review_title: Game changer for thick long hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this styler it completely blew me away! The curls hold and my hair is super smooth after! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for a couple weeks and honestly itu2019s been amazing my hair has significantly improved, I can get a bouncy blow out salon look and feel with ease. the colour is so cute. My reason for it not being five stars is because of the price and i did not receive the cleaning tool with my product i looked everywhere in the package and couldnu2019t find it

reviews.review_title: A must have for a curly hair person
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After the first use, I can see the difference it made to my hair, specially for a person who has a mixture of curly and wavy hair, It is a truly a gem. Not too much heat and not too much time to tame the curls.
The color is so cute! Everything was ok! I will try it soon

reviews.review_title: Sephora gave me a returned item
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If I spend $700+ on a hair tool, I expect it to not have scuffs or be missing any parts. My air wrap and the box was covered in scuffs and scratches, and the filter cleaner was missing. So annoying.
